results.title: Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ who had @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@cerebral infarction@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@cerebral haemorrhage@@@ and were @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ (systolic blood pressure [SBP] >160 mm Hg) were randomly assigned by secure internet central randomisation to receive oral @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or placebo if they were non-dysphagic, or intravenous @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@, sublingual @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, or placebo if they had @DISEASE_Deglutition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003680 @@@dysphagia@@@, within 36 h of symptom onset in this double-blind pilot trial.

citations.NLM: Potter JF, Robinson TG, Ford GA, Mistri A, James M, Chernova J, Jagger C. Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial. Lancet Neurol. 2009 Jan;8(1):48-56. PMID: 19058760
citations.BibTeX: @article{19058760, title={Controlling hypertension and hypotension immediately post-stroke (CHHIPS): a randomised, placebo-controlled, double-blind pilot trial.}, author={Potter JF and Robinson TG and Ford GA and Mistri A and James M and Chernova J and Jagger C}, journal={Lancet Neurol}, volume={8}, number={1}, pages={48-56}}
